summary: Based on the German cult comic, 'Werner' and his bike gang are threatened to be thrown out their club house at the harbor by an unscrupulous property shark but they fight back with all means.
cast: Klaus Büchner|Rötger Feldmann|Thomas Struck|Andi Feldmann|Kulle Westphal|Robert Schlunze|Benno Hoffmann|Harald Wehmeier|Axel Ludwig|Friederike von Hof|Jan Fedder|Lilo Wanders|Volker Nökel|Bertram Hiese|Raymond Voß|Ruth Rockenschaub
title: Werner - Volles Rooäää!!!
